question: Many civilians were recently killed in Burkina Faso due to terror strike in the military base and a village. Where is Burkina Faso?
explanation: Burkina Faso is a landlocked country located in the Western Africa. Many civilians, soldiers and 80 militants were killed in this incident. Majority of the civilians who died in this incident was women. Burkina Faso, a predominantly Muslim country, was once relatively stable, had descended into serious unrest since 2015.
